lines.text: I hear you can take anything on four wheels, man, and fly it away to heaven.
Well don't believe everything you hear.
I thought bustin' cars was your thing.
Well a car ain't nothing but a series of locks. Older the lock, easier it is. And this place... is old.
Let me tell you something. I was making it a real point to mind my own business. Maybe you oughta try that for a while. Start right now. You give me back my ball, I'll give you yours.
